trans-unit.source: Instructs the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) infrastructure to use the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> instead of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Instrui a infraestrutura do WCF (Windows Communication Foundation) a usar o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> em vez do <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.XmlObjectSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: This attribute is similar to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: Esse atributo é semelhante de <xref:System.ServiceModel.DataContractFormatAttribute> atributo.

trans-unit.source: Both attributes can be applied to a method, class, or interface.
trans-unit.target: Ambos os atributos podem ser aplicados a um método, classe ou interface.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, see [Using the XmlSerializer Class](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-the-xmlserializer-class.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, consulte [usando a classe XmlSerializer](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/using-the-xmlserializer-class.md).

trans-unit.source: A method can have either of the two attributes applied, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Um método pode ter um dos dois atributos aplicados, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: Any operation that has neither applied uses the attribute applied to the containing class.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer operação que não aplicado tem usa o atributo aplicado para a classe continente.

trans-unit.source: If the containing class does not have either attribute applied, the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> is used.
trans-unit.target: Se a classe continente não tem um atributo aplicado, o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer> é usado.

trans-unit.source: Applying the attribute also causes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior> to be created at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Aplicando o atributo também faz com que um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.XmlSerializerOperationBehavior> a serem criados no tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: The behavior allows customization at runtime of the serializer behavior.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento permite a personalização em tempo de execução do comportamento do serializador.

trans-unit.source: The following example applies the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> to an interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir aplica-se a <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> a uma interface.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SOAP style of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo SOAP do <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatStyle" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatStyle" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatStyle.Document" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatStyle.Document" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Use%2A> properties affect how messages are formatted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Use%2A> propriedades afetam como as mensagens são formatadas.

trans-unit.source: For a complete example, see [Setting the Use and Style Properties](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/setting-the-use-and-style-properties.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo completo, consulte [definindo as propriedades de estilo e Use](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/setting-the-use-and-style-properties.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> should be used for reading and writing faults.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica que o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> deve ser usado para ler e gravar falhas.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> should be used for reading and writing faults; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" /> should be used.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> deve ser usado para ler e gravar falhas. <see langword="false" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer" /> deve ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default formatter for fault serialization is the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: O formatador padrão para a serialização de falha é o <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContractSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: To use the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, set this property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para usar o <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>, defina essa propriedade como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Starting in .NET 4 the serializer set by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.SupportFaults%2A> property will be used even if a custom behavior is set on the contract to which the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> is applied.
trans-unit.target: Iniciando no .NET 4 o serializador definido pelo <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.SupportFaults%2A> propriedade será usada mesmo se um comportamento personalizado é definido no contrato ao qual o <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute> é aplicada.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies the format to use.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que especifica o formato a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatUse" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatUse" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatUse.Literal" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see cref="F:System.ServiceModel.OperationFormatUse.Literal" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Use%2A> properties affect how messages are formatted.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Style%2A> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.XmlSerializerFormatAttribute.Use%2A> propriedades afetam como as mensagens são formatadas.

trans-unit.source: For a complete example, see [Setting the Use and Style Properties](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/setting-the-use-and-style-properties.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter um exemplo completo, consulte [definindo as propriedades de estilo e Use](~/docs/framework/wcf/samples/setting-the-use-and-style-properties.md).
